MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA3 and PA5 postcode areas of Paisley. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 4:24AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected as we are awaiting generators to be brought to site and connected and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55AM on 14 February 2021.
